title: 求助！Ubuntu下游戏无法启动
author: kevinsun2004
txt_content:
日志文件

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
kevinsun2004 发表于 2020-5-29 08:25
更新 hmcl  https://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HM ... bs/HMCL-3.3.170.jar

删除 /home/kevinsun2004/文档/.minecraft/versions/1.15.2/1.15.2-natives/ 和 /home/kevinsun2004/文档/.minecraft/libraries

replies.author: kevinsun2004
replies.txt_content:
